name: Frank NELLOM, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent David Digugliemo and Records Supervisor Thomas Rowlands of the State Correctional Institution at Graterford, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Nellom v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Frank NELLOM, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent David Digugliemo and Records Supervisor Thomas Rowlands of the State Correctional Institution at Graterford, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
963 A.2d 1291
Frank NELLOM, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent David Digugliemo and Records Supervisor Thomas Rowlands of the State Correctional Institution at Graterford, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 19, 2009.
